item.title: The Main Methods for Earning $LUCID Tokens
item.dc:creator: Academy
item.description:
In the Lucidia metaverse, users have a variety of opportunities to earn $LUCID tokens, such as through the trade of non-fungible tokens (NFTs), the monetization of their art, skills, or services, the organization of events, or the leasing of virtual real estate. However, in order to enable users to earn tokens while also benefiting the […]

The post The Main Methods for Earning $LUCID Tokens appeared first on Lucidia.
item.content:encoded:
In the Lucidia metaverse, users have a variety of opportunities to earn $LUCID tokens, such as through the trade of non-fungible tokens (NFTs), the monetization of their art, skills, or services, the organization of events, or the leasing of virtual real estate. However, in order to enable users to earn tokens while also benefiting the network, the following four major processes have been designed:



Play2Earn Lucidia has formed strategic alliances with industry-leading game development studios such as Cathoen Games, G2Esports, Playhera, and AAA Gaming Studios, amongst others, in order to utilize the Play2Earn platform to develop interactive and insightful gaming experiences. By engaging in games and getting high scores, players have the opportunity to win $LUCID tokens.

 

Learn2Earn

The AI algorithms behind Lucidia’s creation of customised curriculums, which adapt to the users’ learning pace and style, have the potential to completely transform the learning experience. Users purchase courses with $LUCID tokens, and upon successful completion, they receive a return that is greater than the amount they initially spent. Lucidia hopes to entice major corporate players to migrate their training programs on the platform so they can take use of its features.

 

Train2Earn

Users have the opportunity to earn tokens for their participation in the development of artificial intelligence (AI) that is housed within the metaverse. The Train2Earn mechanism provides users with an incentive to devote their time in the development of AI, which helps to cultivate a robust community of AI specialists.

 

Fit2Earn

Lucidia is now offering virtual fitness classes in the metaverse. These programs are brought to you in partnership with 1rebel gym and the best personal trainers. Users are able to track the number of calories they burn using haptic devices such as the Apple Watch, and they can compete with one another on leaderboards to win incentives in the form of $LUCID tokens. The Fit2Earn program offers participants the opportunity to earn incentives while also participating in immersive fitness experiences.

The post The Main Methods for Earning $LUCID Tokens appeared first on Lucidia.

item.title: $Lucid Token Use Cases: An Overview
item.dc:creator: Academy
item.description:
The $LUCID token is the internal currency of the Lucidia metaverse. It is used for all transactions. Here is a detailed list of the different ways the $LUCID token can be used:   Gaming The $LUCID token is used to buy game items, virtual assets, NFT trading, virtual real estate, and do other in-game transactions […]

The post $Lucid Token Use Cases: An Overview appeared first on Lucidia.
item.content:encoded:
The $LUCID token is the internal currency of the Lucidia metaverse. It is used for all transactions. Here is a detailed list of the different ways the $LUCID token can be used:

 

Gaming

The $LUCID token is used to buy game items, virtual assets, NFT trading, virtual real estate, and do other in-game transactions within the Lucidia ecosystem. This makes it easier for people to play games without having to switch between currencies or payment methods. Users can also use $LUCID tokens to buy access to the game for life or to improve their avatars and profiles. Fans of the Embryo game need $LUCID tokens to feed or change their embryos, making sure that their creatures are unique and strong. $LUCID tokens also let you join tournaments with bigger prize pools.

 

Staking

The staking program in Lucidia gives users rewards for keeping $LUCID tokens in a locked wallet for a certain amount of time. Rewards are given out in the form of $LUCID tokens, so users can buy more tokens and benefit from the growth of the ecosystem. Staking helps keep the network safe and gives users a way to support the platform while making passive income. To get people to stake, they will be offered things like private chats with the development team, access to VIP areas on the map, being put on a whitelist for Lucidia NFT presales, and specific monthly NFTs in exchange for voting rights in the Lucidia DAO system.

 

Marketplace

The idea of the metaverse is deeply woven into Lucidia’s market. All transactions in the Lucidia marketplace will use the $LUCID token to make this integration possible. A gas fee and a small fee paid in $LUCID tokens will also be part of the process of minting.

The post $Lucid Token Use Cases: An Overview appeared first on Lucidia.

item.title: One billion $LUCID tokens: Putting users and the community first
item.dc:creator: Academy
item.description:
The main currency in the Lucidia metaverse is the $LUCID token, of which there are a total of 1,000,000,000 (1 billion). At the TGE, tokens will be split between presale, public IDOs, and liquidity. This will make it possible for $LUCID to be traded on DEX and CEXs.   Here’s how the last $LUCID tokens […]

The post One billion $LUCID tokens: Putting users and the community first appeared first on Lucidia.
item.content:encoded:
The main currency in the Lucidia metaverse is the $LUCID token, of which there are a total of 1,000,000,000 (1 billion). At the TGE, tokens will be split between presale, public IDOs, and liquidity. This will make it possible for $LUCID to be traded on DEX and CEXs.

 

Here’s how the last $LUCID tokens will be given out:

 

Public IDOs: 4%; PreSale: 13%; Reserve and Burn: 13%; Liquidity: DEX/CEX: 5% Development: 10% Team: 6% Marketing and Community: 14% Advisors: 4% Rewards and Staking: 5% System: 9% Operation: 12% Treasury: 10%

This allocation has a 12-month cliff because 13% is set aside as a reserve or to be burned if needed to keep the $LUCID value stable. Also, 9% of $LUCID tokens are given to Lucidia users as in-game rewards and rewards for helping the platform grow, such as staking tokens. In contrast, only 4% of $LUCID tokens are available to the public through IDOs. This shows that Lucidia gives users and the community the most importance.

 

The $LUCID token is still being fine-tuned in terms of how it works. The Lucidia team cares as much about cutting-edge technology and entertainment as they do about system stability, and they know how important tokenomics are to the Lucidia metaverse as a whole. So, they won’t say that the tokenomics are done until they are sure that they meet all of the users’ needs.

 

The money earned by spending $LUCID in-game will be split in the following ways:

 

Buy back and burn to help with liquidity: 40%

Marketing: 25%

Prize pool and system of rewards: 25%

Infrastructure: 10%

Referral Program: 5%

This distribution shows that Lucidia is committed to putting users and the community first. Because 40% of earnings are used to buy back and burn LUCID, its value will rise over time.

The post One billion $LUCID tokens: Putting users and the community first appeared first on Lucidia.

item.title: Race NFT, A Racing Game Driven by the Blockchain
item.dc:creator: Academy
item.description:
Players in the cutting-edge, blockchain-based racing game Race NFT can acquire, improve, and exchange a wide variety of one-of-a-kind automobile NFTs (non-fungible tokens). Each vehicle’s worth is established by its performance in races, and can go up or down depending on how well it does. In addition, users can make their own unique and immersive […]

The post Race NFT, A Racing Game Driven by the Blockchain appeared first on Lucidia.
item.content:encoded:
Players in the cutting-edge, blockchain-based racing game Race NFT can acquire, improve, and exchange a wide variety of one-of-a-kind automobile NFTs (non-fungible tokens). Each vehicle’s worth is established by its performance in races, and can go up or down depending on how well it does. In addition, users can make their own unique and immersive racing experience by designing and customizing their own race tracks.

 

In-game, players can use the $LUCID token to buy automobile NFTs from the game’s marketplace. Several models of the same make and model year have different top speeds, acceleration, and handling. The NFT cars the players have purchased can then be used in races on either player-made or pre-made courses.

 

The top finishers in each race are awarded prizes that can be used to purchase new and improved car NFTs. The vehicle’s performance and resale value will both rise as a result of this. The marketplace allows users to trade vehicle NFTs with one another, creating a secondary market for the tokens and giving users the opportunity to profit from their initial investment.

 

Highlights on the technical side include Race NFT’s use of a decentralized blockchain, which provides a safe and open environment for NFTs and the game’s economy. For lightning-quick action, the game makes use of both on-chain and off-chain mechanisms. Racing NFT’s Unreal Engine 5 development ensures a smooth gameplay experience across all platforms.

 

In addition to racing their NFT cars, users may also employ in-game resources to construct and modify their own unique racetrack. These one-of-a-kind courses can be raced on or shared with other players, making racing more of a social activity. The track-building mode lets players show off their artistic and aesthetic abilities, increasing the game’s intensity.

 

In sum, Race NFT provides a fresh take on the racing genre while also showcasing the cutting-edge technology of NFTs and blockchain. Race NFT is destined to become a fan favorite among gamers thanks to its exciting gameplay, one-of-a-kind customization choices, and the ability to make and share tracks.

The post Race NFT, A Racing Game Driven by the Blockchain appeared first on Lucidia.

item.title: Lucidia Metaverse: An Unparalleled Combination of AI, Gaming, and the Metaverse
item.dc:creator: Academy
item.description:
Lucidia Metaverse is a game-changing platform that blends the power of the metaverse, AI, and gaming to provide users with an unmatched virtual experience. By combining the greatest components from these fast rising industries, Lucidia hopes to build a one-of-a-kind virtual space that captivates and engages a large audience eager to experience the internet’s future. […]

The post Lucidia Metaverse: An Unparalleled Combination of AI, Gaming, and the Metaverse appeared first on Lucidia.
item.content:encoded:
Lucidia Metaverse is a game-changing platform that blends the power of the metaverse, AI, and gaming to provide users with an unmatched virtual experience. By combining the greatest components from these fast rising industries, Lucidia hopes to build a one-of-a-kind virtual space that captivates and engages a large audience eager to experience the internet’s future.

 

The Lucidia team envisions a metaverse that prioritizes user experience while also acknowledging the project’s revenue potential. When huge brands realize the value of having a presence in virtual worlds, Lucidia’s unrivaled graphics experiences will attract advertisers.

 

Gartner predicts that by 2026, nearly 25% of internet users would spend at least an hour per day in the metaverse, making it the go-to location for a variety of activities. With this in mind, Lucidia focuses on three major trends: metaverse development, artificial intelligence, and gaming.

 

Lucidia is a digital society with interactive zones for users to mingle, attend live events, and discover new NFTs. The platform is intended to facilitate commerce, allowing users to purchase, sell, and exchange goods and services within the metaverse.

 

Lucidia Metaverse’s three primary focus areas are:

 

AI in Metaverse Gaming: AI developments have increased the immersion of metaverse gaming by improving the entire gaming experience and offering players with interactive and realistic gameplay. AI is utilized to generate individualized game worlds, natural language processing for smooth communication, and the development of lifelike non-player characters (NPCs).

 

Social Interaction and Live Events: By providing interactive zones for socializing and witnessing live events, Lucidia encourages users to connect and engage with one another. These areas establish a feeling of community, foster long-term relationships, and encourage user retention.

 

Commerce and NFTs: The platform allows users to purchase, sell, and exchange products and services within the metaverse. This includes the discovery, development, and trade of one-of-a-kind NFTs, which opens up new avenues for artists, makers, and collectors.

 

1-2 photos with captions:

 

Picture depicting the intersection of AI, gaming, and the metaverse in Lucidia, with players interacting with lifelike NPCs, bespoke game environments, and trade. “Lucidia Metaverse: A one-of-a-kind blend of Intelligence, gaming, and the metaverse for an unrivaled virtual experience.”

Picture shows Lucidia Metaverse users mingling and attending live events, emphasizing the platform’s emphasis on community and interaction. “Lucidia Metaverse fosters community and engagement through interactive social zones and live events.”

The post Lucidia Metaverse: An Unparalleled Combination of AI, Gaming, and the Metaverse appeared first on Lucidia.

item.title: Lucidia Metaverse: The Best Crypto Pre-Sale of 2023 Runs on Unreal Engine 5
item.dc:creator: Academy
item.description:
Unreal Engine 5 technology is used to run Lucidia Metaverse, which is one of the best crypto pre-sales of 2023. This game engine gives the metaverse a number of features that are important to its success: Physics Simulation: The physics simulation system in Unreal Engine allows for realistic interactions between objects, such as dynamic collisions, […]

The post Lucidia Metaverse: The Best Crypto Pre-Sale of 2023 Runs on Unreal Engine 5 appeared first on Lucidia.
item.content:encoded:
Unreal Engine 5 technology is used to run Lucidia Metaverse, which is one of the best crypto pre-sales of 2023. This game engine gives the metaverse a number of features that are important to its success:

Physics Simulation: The physics simulation system in Unreal Engine allows for realistic interactions between objects, such as dynamic collisions, object destruction, and ragdoll physics. This makes the game world more immersive.

Animation: The engine has a system for animating characters that lets developers make them move in complex ways. This makes the game world feel more real and alive.

AI: Unreal Engine’s AI system lets developers make enemies that are smart and respond to what the player does. This makes the game more interesting and challenging.

Graphics: Real-time reflections, dynamic shadows, and physically-based rendering are some of the advanced graphics features that make the game world look beautiful and feel real.

Sound: The engine’s audio system lets developers make realistic sound effects, music, and voiceovers, which are important for hosting virtual events like concerts in the metaverse.

Multiplayer: Unreal Engine lets you play games with other people, so you can socialize in the metaverse.

Tools: A set of tools, such as tools for level design, animation, and scripting, helps developers make and change game content quickly so they can focus on the creative parts of making games.

Using the power of Unreal Engine 5, Lucidia Metaverse wants to make a groundbreaking project that will change the way people play games and give the crypto pre-sale market a unique chance.

The post Lucidia Metaverse: The Best Crypto Pre-Sale of 2023 Runs on Unreal Engine 5 appeared first on Lucidia.

item.title: The Best Crypto Pre-Sale of 2023: How the $LUCID Token Will Disrupt the Gaming, Staking, and Other Industries
item.dc:creator: Academy
item.description:
The $LUCID token is the driving force behind all Lucidia Metaverse transactions. The $LUCID token has many applications, some of which are shown below.   In-game purchases, NFT trading, and virtual real estate are just some of the ways that gamers put $LUCID to use within the Lucidia ecosystem. It also lets users create their […]

The post The Best Crypto Pre-Sale of 2023: How the $LUCID Token Will Disrupt the Gaming, Staking, and Other Industries appeared first on Lucidia.
item.content:encoded:
The $LUCID token is the driving force behind all Lucidia Metaverse transactions. The $LUCID token has many applications, some of which are shown below.

 

In-game purchases, NFT trading, and virtual real estate are just some of the ways that gamers put $LUCID to use within the Lucidia ecosystem. It also lets users create their own unique avatars, enter competitive events, and play in ranked games.

 

Staking: The staking mechanism provides incentives for keeping $LUCID tokens in a cold storage wallet for a predetermined time period. As an incentive, staking participants may be granted special privileges such as whitelisting for Lucidia NFT presales or the ability to cast votes in Lucidia DAO elections.

 

Tokenized $LUCID tokens are used for all purchases and sales in the Lucidia marketplace, which operates in tandem with the metaverse. Users can engage in activities such as exchanging NFTs, making money off of their artwork, and renting out virtual property.

 

The Lucidia Metaverse provides its users with a number of means through which they can acquire $LUCID tokens:

 

By taking part in games developed by industry leaders and attaining high scores, players can earn $LUCID tokens through the Play2Earn program.

 

  1. Learn2Earn: Customers pay with $LUCID tokens and receive tokens as a reward for completing customised educational courses.

 

  1. Train2Learn: Users can aid in the advancement of AI in the metaverse in exchange for $LUCID tokens.

 

  1. Fit2Earn: Users can keep tabs on their fitness progress with the help of Fit2Earn’s fitness partners and get rewarded in $LUCID tokens.

 

The $LUCID token is one of the best crypto pre-sales of 2023 because of the potential it has to change the gaming, staking, and virtual world industries.

The post The Best Crypto Pre-Sale of 2023: How the $LUCID Token Will Disrupt the Gaming, Staking, and Other Industries appeared first on Lucidia.

item.title: The Greatest Crypto Pre-Sale of 2023: Lucidia First-Person Shooter
item.dc:creator: Academy
item.description:
Lucidia’s first-person shooter (FPS) promises to be the best of its kind because to its wide variety of game options and frenetic pace. In Lucidia, players explore a digital world in search of loot and adventure while participating in violent battle with hostile troops and a wide variety of weapons.   Characteristics that make Lucidia […]

The post The Greatest Crypto Pre-Sale of 2023: Lucidia First-Person Shooter appeared first on Lucidia.
item.content:encoded:
Lucidia’s first-person shooter (FPS) promises to be the best of its kind because to its wide variety of game options and frenetic pace. In Lucidia, players explore a digital world in search of loot and adventure while participating in violent battle with hostile troops and a wide variety of weapons.

 

Characteristics that make Lucidia a great first-person shooter

 

The Lucidia First-Person Shooter features four distinct game modes, including a single-player story campaign, online multiplayer, local co-op, and a free-for-all deathmatch.

 

Tools for Making Games: Lucidia gives users the ability to make their own games in a wide variety of genres, from first-person shooters to adventure games to strategic simulations.

 

In the game’s single-player “Campaign Mode,” players are immersed in an engaging narrative as they perform tasks and make their way through the game.

 

Co-op mode encourages teamwork and cooperation by letting players take on tasks together and destroy adversaries.

 

Gameplay is spiced up with a competitive element in the Multiplayer Mode, where players fight against one another in various modes like deathmatch, capture the flag, and team-based objectives.

 

In the multiplayer mode known as “Battle Royale,” participants compete against one another on a constantly contracting battlefield, with the victor being the last man or team standing.

 

Character and weapon customization features in Lucidia First-Person Shooter allow players to express their individuality and create unique builds.

 

The Lucidia First-Person Shooter is an integral part of the top crypto pre-sale of 2023, giving players everywhere a once-in-a-lifetime experience. Don’t pass up the chance to work on something that will change the face of the gaming industry forever.

The post The Greatest Crypto Pre-Sale of 2023: Lucidia First-Person Shooter appeared first on Lucidia.

item.title: The best cryptocurrency pre-sale of 2023 and the future of the gaming ecosystem
item.dc:creator: Academy
item.description:
With its cutting-edge platform that combines tools for making games and a large library of games to give players an unmatched gaming experience, Lucidia is changing the way games are made and played. This new platform has a lot of different ways to play games, such as different game modes and partnerships with game developers […]

The post The best cryptocurrency pre-sale of 2023 and the future of the gaming ecosystem appeared first on Lucidia.
item.content:encoded:
With its cutting-edge platform that combines tools for making games and a large library of games to give players an unmatched gaming experience, Lucidia is changing the way games are made and played. This new platform has a lot of different ways to play games, such as different game modes and partnerships with game developers and studios.

 

The main things about the Lucidia Gaming Ecosystem are:

 

Game Making: Lucidia lets players bring their creative ideas to life by giving them a set of tools for making games. These tools let them make games in different genres, like adventure, strategy, and more.

 

Multiple Game Modes: Lucidia has a lot of fun and immersive ways to play, such as single-player campaigns, multiplayer modes, and cooperative modes.

 

Customization Options: Lucidia gives players a lot of ways to change their characters and weapons, so they can make them fit their play style.

 

Partnerships with Game Developers and Studios: Lucidia gives its community a wide range of high-quality games from all types of game developers by forming partnerships with the best people in the gaming industry.

 

Dedication to the Gaming Community: Lucidia is committed to giving its community the best gaming experiences possible, whether they want to make their own game, play a game made by someone else, or try out the newest games on the market.

 

Lucidia is without a doubt the best crypto pre-sale of 2023 and a game-changer in the gaming ecosystem. By putting money into Lucidia, you are not only putting money into a project with a lot of potential, but also into the future of gaming. Don’t miss this amazing chance to be a part of the next generation of video games

The post The best cryptocurrency pre-sale of 2023 and the future of the gaming ecosystem appeared first on Lucidia.

item.title: AI Brain NFTs in the Lucidia Metaverse Will Revolutionize Gaming in 2023’s Best Crypto Pre-Sale
item.dc:creator: Academy
item.description:
With its revolutionary AI Brain NFT technology, Lucidia metaverse is offering the best cryptocurrency pre-sale of 2023 and elevating metaverse gaming to a whole new level. With Lucidia, players can get their AI-powered brain in the form of an NFT, which is the essential component of their character, as opposed to just buying weapons or […]

The post AI Brain NFTs in the Lucidia Metaverse Will Revolutionize Gaming in 2023’s Best Crypto Pre-Sale appeared first on Lucidia.
item.content:encoded:
With its revolutionary AI Brain NFT technology, Lucidia metaverse is offering the best cryptocurrency pre-sale of 2023 and elevating metaverse gaming to a whole new level. With Lucidia, players can get their AI-powered brain in the form of an NFT, which is the essential component of their character, as opposed to just buying weapons or clothing. This special digital item can be added to a video game character or avatar, giving it the ability to behave independently and make decisions without human input.

 

Important Properties of AI Brain NFTs

 

Advanced AI Algorithms: AI brain NFTs are driven by state-of-the-art algorithms that allow them to interact with the virtual world and make decisions based on pre-programmed goals and objectives.

 

Blockchain Integration: AI brain NFTs are constructed using blockchain technology, offering a safe, open, and unchangeable record of their communications with the virtual world.

 

Decentralized Control: AI brain NFTs can work independently and autonomously without the need for a centralized authority thanks to the decentralized nature of blockchain technology.

 

NFT Tokenization: AI brain NFTs are represented as separate, non-transferable tokens that make it simple to transfer ownership, trade, and track each brain’s unique traits and skills.

 

From gaming and entertainment to education and healthcare, Lucidia’s AI Brain NFT technology has the potential to change a number of different industries. Developers may make user experiences more unique and interesting by including AI Brain NFTs, such as tailoring game settings, missions, and characters to players’ tastes and skills or giving Non-Player Characters (NPCs) a more realistic and lifelike appearance.

 

Don’t pass on the 2023’s top cryptocurrency pre-sale! Lucidia Metaverse’s AI Brain NFT technology, a potent invention that will revolutionize how we interact with the virtual world and beyond, is worth investing in.

The post AI Brain NFTs in the Lucidia Metaverse Will Revolutionize Gaming in 2023’s Best Crypto Pre-Sale appeared first on Lucidia.
